name: Free Yourself
description:
You are swallowed by a shadow and must free yourself from inside of it.  Collect pieces of light that were consumed by the shadow to escape,  or become lost within the halls of the dark and become another servant of the shadow. When you move the shadow servant will follow your exact moves you made up until finally catching you. Move quick in order to get yourself away. If a shadow servant catches you...you will lose all of your pieces of light...

Some say, you can kill the shadow from within...

How to play:

W or Spacebar to jump and double jump.

A/D to move left and right.
